name: Wireless Headphones
description: High quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, deep bass, and comfortable over-ear design for all-day use. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.

name: Smartwatch
description: Stay connected with this sleek smartwatch. Track your fitness, messages, heart rate, sleep patterns, and GPS location with precision. Water-resistant up to 50 meters.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful bass and 360° sound projection. Rugged and waterproof design makes it perfect for outdoor adventures and parties.

name: Gaming Keyboard
description: Mechanical gaming keyboard with RGB backlighting, programmable keys, and ergonomic wrist rest. Designed for fast response and durability for hardcore gamers.

name: 4K Monitor
description: Ultra HD 27-inch 4K monitor with HDR support, ultra-thin bezel, and adjustable stand. Perfect for creative professionals and gamers seeking crystal-clear visuals.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek and compact design with non-slip surface and LED indicator.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Slim fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, step counter, sleep analysis, and smartphone notifications. Water-resistant and lightweight for everyday wear.

name: Smart Home Speaker
description: Voice-controlled smart speaker with premium sound quality, multi-room support, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant.
